chapter.title: Creating a New BML Scheme
chapter.para: The look of your site is probably the first thing you're going to want to customize, because c'mon, who wants a LiveJournal.com clone?

section.para:
You'll want to look at the BML section in ljp docs that details writing a local bmlp.cfg file, which you can use to specify certain directives.
To start, you're going to want to create a directory under the local cvs bml scheme directory (/cvs/local/cgi-bin/bml/scheme/). The name of this directory will be the unique identifier for the template you're creating, which you will use later for testing purposes.
